meanings.sent1: The office reorganizer helped us tidy up the files.
meanings.sent2: The reorganizer rearranged the furniture in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The reorganizer made the messy closet look neat and organized.
meanings.sent4: She was like a reorganizer, bringing order to the chaos of the room.
meanings.sent5: The reorganizer's skills transformed the cluttered space into a functional area.

meanings.sent1: I need to reorganizer my schedule for the week.
meanings.sent2: She decided to reorganizer her bookshelf by genre.
meanings.sent3: He tried to reorganizer his thoughts before the important meeting.
meanings.sent4: The team had to reorganizer their strategy after the unexpected setback.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to reorganizer their desks for group work.
